descriptionHtml:
First off all, Sorry for my english, I am Czech.

I made this 3 lycan race, bec I was a little disapointed, there is no Argonian Lycan race.
Races have the same powers and skills but i made them for all thoses plays as argonian or khajiit. Race are:

Lycan (From Imperial Race)
Lycanian (From Argonian) *Female have nord voice, bec argonian fmale voice is worst.
Lycajiit (From Khajiit)

Stats
Powers and skills
Magicka: 100
Health: 130
Samina: 130

Skills:
Sneak: +10
One-Handed: +10
Light Armor: +5
Archery: +5
Enchanting: +5

Powers/Abilities
Beast Form
Eyes of Lycan ability - Unlimited night vision (In fact, set is 10 hours)
Lycan Scent - Modificated Detect life to lesser power - it has just 2 second effect, but can be used immediately again and cost 0 magicka.
Lycan Rage - Day power: Regenerate health and Stamina 20x faster. Do double damange and take just half damange. (All 60 second)
Caws: Unarmed damange 15 points.
Resist disease 100%

*Powers and ability are named by race (For exp. Lycan Rage/Lycanian Rage/Lycajiit Rage)
*For Lycan race claw unarmed damange is renamed to fist unarmed damange
*Basic day powers and imperial Luck are removed (Argonian hitskin no need - Lycanian rage have faster regeneration)

*If you using Moonlight Tales mod, you must consume werewolf blood to unlock skin system

*All mods which exp. change textures on khajiit, argonian and imperial will be effect on these races too.

Known bugs
- pressets from Racemenu not working (hair/horns not show, eyes no change)

For a better game, I recommend these mods:
- Moonlight tales http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35470/?
- Extra Werewolf perks http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34770/?
- Real feeding http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58038/?
- Predator vision http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22274/?
author: Lucky14
